name: EasySignCut Pro Project
summary: An ESC file is a project created by EasySignCut Pro, an application used to design signs, logos, lettering, decals, and stickers to be made with cutting plotters. It contains a design, which may include text, drawn lines, paintbrush strokes, shapes, images, and other objects. ESC files may also contain effects such as 3D extrude, rhinestones, shadow layers, and bulges.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
